Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We haven't found any endura carrots,
but I think my husband and I will continue
poking around here for now.
You might have more luck searching for
them at the top of the mountain though.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We were hoping to find some endura
carrots, but there's nothing we can do
in this rain.
I would hate to put my husband's health
at further risk.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>You are part of why my husband and I can
share quiet moments like this.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Sometimes it's enough to just sit and
enjoy your partner's company.
AssassinEquipment_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Also...<sp:5:1:0>I'm sorry to ask this, but are you
in the Yiga Clan?

I've met a lot of people in my life, <sp:5:1:0>and I
make a point not to judge people by how
they look.
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>But I don't think you should go into town
with that outfit on.

Unless you want to go to jail.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>I recognize you. You're the voe who
came to our aid in Gerudo Canyon.

Those Gleeok guts you gave us helped put
my husband back on his feet.

In other words, it's thanks to you that we
can enjoy our wedding adventure.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>He and I are looking for endura carrots
now, in hopes of further improving
his health.
They are said to grow around here,
but so far, we haven't found any.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>It doesn't bother me much. I think we
both get some pleasure out of searching
for them together.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'd heard that this was a place where
endura carrots grew.

But we've scoured this whole area and
haven't found any at all.

Perhaps we had better look around at a
higher elevation.
